委.definition: to entrust; to cast aside; to shift (blame etc); to accumulate; roundabout; winding; dejected; listless; committee member; council; end; actually; certainly

委以.definition: (literary) to entrust with (a task); to appoint to (a role)

委以重任.definition: (literary) to entrust (sb) with an important task

委內瑞拉馬腦炎病毒.pinyin: wěi nèi ruì lā mǎ nǎo yán bìng dú

委培.definition: to commission another organization (a school or training center etc) to train one's personnel (abbr. for 委托培養|委托培养[wei3tuo1 pei2yang3])

委婉.definition: tactful; euphemistic; (of voice etc) suave; soft

委屈.definition: to feel wronged; to cause sb to feel wronged; grievance

委曲.definition: sinuous; devious; full details of a story; to stoop

委託.definition: to entrust; to trust; to commission

委託書.definition: commission; proxy; power of attorney; authorization; warrant

委身.definition: to give oneself wholly to; to put oneself at sb's service; (of a woman) to give one's body to; to marry

委過.definition: variant of 諉過|诿过[wei3 guo4]

委靡不振.definition: variant of 萎靡不振[wei3 mi3 bu4 zhen4]
